sql.query:
SELECT DISTINCT g.lastName, g.firstName, f.uuid
FROM families AS f
LEFT JOIN students AS s ON (s.family = f.uuid) LEFT JOIN guardians AS g ON (g.uuid = f.guardian_uuid) LEFT JOIN enrolments AS e ON (e.student_uuid = s.uuid)
WHERE e.startDate <= :P1 /* {{$_POST.monthtocharge.endMonth(false,'ISO')}} */ AND (e.dropDate IS NULL OR e.dropDate >= :P2 /* {{$_POST.monthtocharge}} */)
